name: Blackinside
description:
Black Inside is an inspiring 2D platform puzzle game that requires the player to control two characters simultaneously to solve the puzzle. Every time the player controls the upper character, the character below will also imitate the actions. Different characters in charge are equipped with different abilities. Therefore, players need to think carefully about planning the movement for characters on both sides and switch between different sides flexibly, so as to cooperate the movement of different characters to press the trigger for the door at the same time. 

Visual Reference: 

https://blackthornprod-games.itch.io/necrobomb

Author: Blackthronprod - my favorite YouTuber

Sound Reference:

Ultimate Sound effects: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle-15...
